A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went with my bro this morning to see this\, we were so excited.  2.5 hours later total heart break.  What an entirely disappointing film.  Nothing made sense\, the film felt like twelve dozen executives sat in a writing room and the editors suite (dear lord\, the poor editor) and made Executive Decisions over each and every scene.  I am gutted for dearly departed Carrie Fisher and poor Mark Hamill.  Seriously this is the worst Star Wars film since the Jar Jar Binks ones.  Whomever is behind this version\, SHAME ON YOU.
